title: Elite: Dangerous
notes: Requires Frontier Account setup. Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Not working (Paid version only)**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
description: The next game in the Elite series - an amazing space epic with stunning visuals, incredible gameplay, breath-taking scope and award-winning sound. All content can be enjoyed in game any mode: solo, personal invite-only group or open/MMO. Carve your own path through the richest, largest gaming sandbox ever created, a 1:1 scale representation of the Milky Way galaxy, set against a backdrop of raw anarchy, galactic powerplays and political intrigue.
